scene.tuio
Class SceneTuioClient

java.lang.Object
  scene.tuio.SceneTuioClient

public class SceneTuioClient
extends java.lang.Object

The SceneTuioClient class is the central TUIO protocol decoder component. It provides a simple callback infrastructure using the SceneTuioListener interface. In order to receive and decode TUIO object, cursor and blob messages, an instance of SceneTuioClient needs to be created. The SceneTuioClient instance then generates events which are broadcasted to all registered classes that implement the SceneTuioListener interface.

SceneTuioClient client = new SceneTuioClient();
client.addTuioListener(mySceneTuioListener);
client.connect();

Author:
Laurence Bender (based on the TUIO Java backend 1.4 by Martin Kaltenbrunner)
Version:
1.0
